title: Can't Open League
body: I was joining a game on summoners rift and when we got into game, i alt + tabbed out and when i went to alt tab back in my screen went black and i could only see the bar where all of my games and stuff were, so i tried to right click league and hit close but it did nothing, so i restarted my computer and the game was remade. Now when I try to open league it is telling me "You are trying to open the League of Legends game client in an invalid way. To successfully open the game client, click on the Play button and join a queue or create a custom game." please help, i don't want to reinstall league as that takes forever, but will if i have too.

replies.body:
It sounds like you may be trying to open the game client directly, but it's necessary to do so through the patcher.  If not or if you're still experiencing this issue, it could also be due to corrupt game files preventing you from launching the game properly.  

As a first step, I recommend going over the steps in our [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq5) guide as well as [running a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq5) to resolve any problems with your files.  Please let me know how this goes for you or if your issue persists, and we can take a deeper look.
Are you receiving this when you click the shortcut (L) or the Play button on the patcher?
